issue.title: meta::alignment_of should exclude data member description of bit-field

discussion.p: p#8 This should similarly disallow data member descriptions of bit-fields.

blockquote.p:
-8- Throws: `meta::exception` unless all of the following conditions are met:
(8.1) — `dealias(r)` is a reflection of a type, object, variable of non-reference type, non-static data member that is not a bit-field, direct base class relationship, or data member description (T,N,A,W,NUA) () where W is ⊥..
(8.2) — If `dealias(r)` represents a type, then `is_complete_type(r)` is true.
